mechanism.description: Sensory structures in the external auditory canal detect chemical signals from earwax.

evidence.title: Demodex cyonis - Wikipedia
evidence.author: Wikipedia Contributors
evidence.citation: Wikipedia contributors. (2024). Demodex cyonis. In Wikipedia, The Free Encyclopedia.
evidence.note: Inferred from the mite's habitat in earwax and its movement to the outer ear.

mechanism.description: Sensory structures detect physical contact in the external auditory canal and outer skin.

evidence.title: Demodex cyonis - Wikipedia
evidence.author: Wikipedia Contributors
evidence.citation: Wikipedia contributors. (2024). Demodex cyonis. In Wikipedia, The Free Encyclopedia.
evidence.note: Inferred from the mite's movement and habitat.
